title: flashencrypt
extract: Flash drives have become a standard in removable media because they're small, easily swapped between systems, and can be read and rewritten. ... Having your flash drive encrypted means that if the drive is lost or stolen, your personal data isn't easily recovered.
extract_html: Flash drives have become a standard in removable media because they're small, easily swapped between systems, and can be read and rewritten. ... Having your flash drive encrypted means that if the drive is lost or stolen, your personal data isn't easily recovered.
